entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
